data.prayer: Please, teach the 273,041 believers in Carabobo, Venezuela how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Carabobo, Venezuela
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Carabobo. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Carabobo, Venezuela.
data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself real to these new families.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Carabobo, Venezuela.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 273,041 believers in Carabobo against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Cuiba people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, make bold the prophets in Carabobo, Venezuela so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: the state of Carabobo has (about) 273,041 people who know Jesus, 1,582,075 people who know about him culturally, and 390,583 people who are far from Jesus.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Carabobo, Venezuela.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
